name: Village Of Time - Prologue
description:
Game still in development. 

Player will need to protect Village from monsters but the catch is that you can't attack. You will need to get resources (wood/silver/gold) and buy items (Axe/Pickaxe) needed to get more. When you collect enough you will be able to build tower to protect your village, each  tower can be improved. On map you can find treasure chests and yellow potion which will double your walking speed for one minute (only one can work on time if you take new, it wont give extra speed or time). Axe , pickaxe and potions are also  randomly spawned on map. Maximum you can hold 3 x each item if you pick up new it will repair what you have. Items get damaged during use and break. 

The game contains elements from the strategy , towers defense and survival.

Controls:

Move : W , S , A , D or Arrows

Action : F , R or Mouse 

Quest : Q

Pause  : Esc 

Check latest update on YouTube Channel TW Games Indie Dev

Web GL version : Play on full screen game is for standalone with resolution 1920 x 1080 , but to give more ppl access I add it,  that you don't need download anything if you don't want to.

Game main focus is Standalone so hope everything will work like it should on WebGL, however some sound is quieter and slightly different (Mining , Pickup). 

Village of Time - Prologue give access only to 1 level. Full game will have 9 levels different missions and enemies which will attack on both side.
